alert.note: Alert for Coastal Onslow; East Carteret; Inland Onslow; Jones; Northern Craven; Pamlico; Southern Craven; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 30 at 12:56AM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Jones, southeastern Craven, northeastern Onslow, Carteret and southwestern Pamlico Counties through 130 AM EDT... At 1256 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Open Grounds Farm to near Onslow Beach. Movement was north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, New Bern, Havelock, Morehead City, Newport, Harkers Island, Piney Green, James City, Trent Woods, River Bend, Stella, Swansboro, Hubert, South River, Cape Carteret, North River, Straits, Marshallberg, Smyrna and Merrimon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Onslow; East Carteret; Inland Onslow; Jones; Northern Craven; Pamlico; Southern Craven; West Carteret
